snippet: IBM Corp is exploring the sale of its semiconductor business and has hired Goldman Sachs to find potential buyers, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter....

headline.print_headline: IBM Explores Sale of Semiconductor Business: Financial Times
headline.main: IBM Explores Sale of Semiconductor Business: Financial Times

lead_paragraph: IBM Corp is exploring the sale of its semiconductor business and has hired Goldman Sachs to find potential buyers, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter.
